text: @RobertJenrick if you've coronavirus/symptoms #StayHOME how many did they infect/kill when travelling outside his local area, while putting the public/emergency services at risk of RTA ... & travelling 30 miles to Barnard Castle on his wife's birthday with her/child to test his dodgy eyesight?
